ver.downgrade: Your production build is newer than stable!

externalApp.title: Opening link in external app
externalApp.message: A website tries to redirect the link with the different origin to the external application. Continue anyway?

menuBar.name: Menu bar
menuBar.description: Changes visibility settings of native menu bar.
menuBar.label: Hide menu bar automatically (<kbd>ALT</kbd> key switches the visibility).

tray.name: Tray
tray.description: Changes the visibility of the icon in the system tray.
tray.label: Disable hiding window to the system tray functionality.

blockApi.name: Discord API blocking
blockApi.description: Blocks Discord API requests for hardening the privacy.

permissions.name: Permissions
permissions.description: Allows or denies the permission checks and request from the Discord website. Please note that other permissions not listed here are blocked automatically by WebCord.

devel.name: Developer mode
devel.description: Enables the access to tools and unfinished options that are potentially considered as broken or dangerous. Disclaimer: application maintainers are not responsible for any bugs or issues after this option is enabled – please do not report them!
devel.label: Enable developer mode

thirdparty.name: Third party websites
thirdparty.description: Sets a list of the third-party websites allowed to connect or display content.

enable.description: Switches whenever application should ignore Discord's Content Security Policy headers and let client set its own CSP for privacy and security concerns.
enable.label: Use in-app Content Security Policy

crossOrigin.name: Cross-origin redirection behavior
crossOrigin.description: Controls the actions on cross-origin redirections. This affects application security.
crossOrigin.label: Always warn user about cross-origin redirections to external applications.

instance.name: Discord instance
instance.description: Selects the instance WebCord should connect to. Experimental as the Fosscord implementation is not fully finished yet.

optimize.name: Client optimizations
optimize.description: Tries to detect the user software and hardware to apply custom flags to the Chromium engine that might improve Electron's performance or functionality. Experimental, as there's a reason why Chromium does not apply these flags by itself.

checklist.gpu: Optimize the client for the currently active graphics card.
